020
021import net.tnemc.core.account.shared.Member;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.shared.Permission;
023
024import java.util.Optional;
025import java.util.UUID;
026import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
027
028/**
029 * Represents an Account object that is shared by multiple players.
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @see Account
033 * @since 0.1.2.0
034 */
035public class SharedAccount extends Account {
036
037  protected final ConcurrentHashMap<UUID, Member> members = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
038
039  /**
040   * The {@link UUID identifier} of the owner of this {@link Account account}.
041   */
042  protected UUID owner;
043
044  public SharedAccount(final UUID identifier, final String name, final UUID owner) {
045
046    super(identifier, name);
047
048    this.owner = owner;
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Checks if the specified identifier is a member of this account.
053   *
054   * @param identifier The identifier to check.
055   *
056   * @return True if the specified identifier is a member, otherwise false.
057   */
058  public boolean isMember(final UUID identifier) {
059
060    return owner.equals(identifier) || members.containsKey(identifier);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Used to find a specific {@link Member member} of this account if it exists.
065   *
066   * @param identifier The identifier to use for the search.
067   *
068   * @return An Optional containing the {@link Member member} if exists, otherwise an empty
069   * Optional.
070   */
071  public Optional<Member> findMember(final UUID identifier) {
072
073    return Optional.ofNullable(members.get(identifier));
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Sets the permission specified to the specified value for the specified member.
078   *
079   * @param identifier The identifier of the member to use.
080   * @param permission The permission to set.
081   * @param value      The value to set for the permission.
082   */
083  public void addPermission(final UUID identifier, final Permission permission, final boolean value) {
084
085    final Member member = members.getOrDefault(identifier, new Member(identifier));
086    member.addPermission(permission, value);
087    members.put(identifier, member);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Sets the permission specified to the specified value for the specified member.
092   *
093   * @param identifier The identifier of the member to use.
094   * @param permission The permission to set.
095   * @param value      The value to set for the permission.
096   */
097  public void addPermission(final UUID identifier, final String permission, final boolean value) {
098
099    final Member member = members.getOrDefault(identifier, new Member(identifier));
100    member.addPermission(permission, value);
101    members.put(identifier, member);
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Removes the permission specified from the specified member.
106   *
107   * @param identifier The identifier of the member to use.
108   * @param permission The permission to set.
109   */
110  public void removePermission(final UUID identifier, final Permission permission) {
111
112    findMember(identifier).ifPresent(mem->mem.removePermission(permission));
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Removes the permission specified from the specified member.
117   *
118   * @param identifier The identifier of the member to use.
119   * @param permission The permission to set.
120   */
121  public void removePermission(final UUID identifier, final String permission) {
122
123    findMember(identifier).ifPresent(mem->mem.removePermission(permission));
124  }
125
126  /**
127   * Checks if the specified member has the specified permission.
128   *
129   * @param identifier The identifier of the member to use.
130   * @param permission The permission to we are checking for.
131   *
132   * @return True if the specified member has the specified permission, otherwise false.
133   */
134  public boolean hasPermission(final UUID identifier, final Permission permission) {
135
136    if(owner.equals(identifier)) return true;
137    return findMember(identifier).map(value->value.hasPermission(permission))
138            .orElseGet(permission::defaultValue);
139  }
140
141  /**
142   * Checks if the specified member has the specified permission.
143   *
144   * @param identifier   The identifier of the member to use.
145   * @param permission   The permission to we are checking for.
146   * @param defaultValue The default value to return if this account doesn't contain the
147   *                     permission.
148   *
149   * @return True if the specified member has the specified permission, otherwise false.
150   */
151  public boolean hasPermission(final UUID identifier, final String permission, final boolean defaultValue) {
152
153    if(owner.equals(identifier)) return true;
154    return findMember(identifier).map(value->value.hasPermission(permission, defaultValue)).orElse(defaultValue);
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * Used to get the type of account that this is. This is for data-purposes only.
159   *
160   * @return The account type.
161   */
162  @Override
163  public String type() {
164
165    return "shared";
166  }
167
168  public ConcurrentHashMap<UUID, Member> getMembers() {
169
170    return members;
171  }
172
173  public UUID getOwner() {
174
175    return owner;
176  }
177
178  public void setOwner(final UUID owner) {
179
180    this.owner = owner;
181  }
182}
